pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:5.1: 2. The training rule on the sharing out of out-of-season robe-cloth
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.2: At that time, after spending the rainy-season residence in a village monastery, a number of nuns were traveling to Sāvatthī. They were perfect in conduct and deportment, but poorly dressed in shabby robes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.3: Some lay followers who saw them thought,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.4: “These nuns are perfect in conduct and deportment, but poorly dressed in shabby robes; they must’ve been robbed,” and they gave out-of-season robe-cloth to the Order of nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.5: Because they had done the robe-making ceremony, the nun Thullanandā
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.6: determined it as in-season robe-cloth, and then shared it out.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.7: The lay disciples asked those nuns whether
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.9: and they replied that they hadn’t
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.10: and told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.12: Those lay disciples then complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:6.13: “How could Venerable Thullanandā determine out-of-season robe-cloth as ‘in-season,’ and then share it out?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those lay followers,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.2: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.3: “How could Venerable Thullanandā determine out-of-season robe-cloth as ‘in-season,’ and then share it out?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.4: Those nuns then told the monks,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.5: who in turn told the Master. …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.6: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.9: How can the nun Thullanandā determine out-of-season robe-cloth as ‘in-season,’ and then share it out?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.10: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:7.11: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:8.1: ‘If a nun determines out-of-season robe-cloth as “in-season,” and then shares it out, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:10.2: if the robe-making ceremony has not been done, robe-cloth that is given during the eleven months. If the robe-making ceremony has been done, robe-cloth that is given during the seven months. Also, if it is given in the robe season, but the cloth is designated, it is called “out-of-season robe-cloth.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:11.1: If she shares it out, after determining out-of-season robe-cloth as “in-season,” then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:11.2: When the robe-cloth is obtained, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:11.3: The robe-cloth is to be relinquished to the Order of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:11.4: “And, monks, it’s to be relinquished in this way.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:11.6: … ‘Venerables, this out-of-season robe-cloth which I shared out after determining it as “in-season” is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Order.’ …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:11.9: ‘I give this robe-cloth back to you.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:12.1: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth and she perceives it as such, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season,” she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:12.2: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth, but she is unsure if it is, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season,” she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:12.3: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth, but she perceives it as in-season robe-cloth, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season,” there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:12.4: If it is in-season robe-cloth, but she perceives it as out-of-season robe-cloth, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:12.5: If it is in-season robe-cloth, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:12.6: If it is in-season robe-cloth and she perceives it as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:13.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:14.1: The second training rule is finished.
